title: Just a quick question on the championship Thresh figurine
body:
So i bought mine and it's on it's way but i was wondering if i needed to have or purchase Thresh to unlock the skin by the 30th or does Thresh come with the skin too automatically? I still want the figure and either way i'll get Thresh, but i just wanted to know. P.S if this isn't in the right section, i'm sorry, i'm still learning to do this. Thanksies!

UPDATE: Riot removed this post in another section, and i have to say thank you for that and letting me know. Again, still getting the hang of this and believe it or not, this was my first guess for this topic XD

replies.body: This will unlock the champion and the skin. The skin codes we give out unlock both the champion and the skin. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=qE7KaiJV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-19T23:03:38.249+0000)
>
> This will unlock the champion and the skin. The skin codes we give out unlock both the champion and the skin. :]

Okie, thank you and great job on the figure to whoever made the design. I love it!
